name: Exterminate the aliens
description:
A downloadable FPS game for Windows.

This is an ANGLE's personal project.

[How to play]

 WASD: Move
 Shift+WASD: Dash
 Left Click: Shoot
 Right Click: Change view
 R: Reload
 Space: Jump
 ESC: Exit

[Special thanks]

Joker Sounds---BGM
Mixamo---Characters
NOKOBOT---Handgun
PURPLE JUMP---Map
qianyuez---Sky
soundeffect-lab.info---Footsteps
Taira Komori---Heartbeats
